Name: HELPLESS
About the game: You must find a way to escape the abandoned hospital. Proceed with caution, however. You are not alone. Explore every corner to find the necessary 'KEY' items to progress further. Be sure to pick up the notes, they may serve a purpose... (This is my very first game to publish, it may not be perfect, but I hope you players enjoy it!)
